privacy_new.title: Data & Privacy
privacy_new.subtitle: How we protect your family's information.

basis.title: Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
basis.subtitle: Why we're allowed to process your child's data

safety.title: Child Safety (Vital Interests)
safety.desc: AI analysis to detect and prevent harm to children

service.title: Service Operation (Contractual Necessity)
service.desc: Technical processing required to deliver the AI companion service

interest.title: Legitimate Interest (With Safeguards)
interest.desc: Improving safety features while protecting child privacy through aggregation

basis.consent: Your consent: You provided explicit consent during account setup. To view your form or withdraw your consent, go to Settings.

visibility.title: What You See (Data Visibility):
items: No raw chat logs or surveillance

request.title: What You Can Request (Data Access Rights):
items: Under GDPR, you may request full data access
This is exceptional and requires legal justification
All requests are logged and reviewed

deletion.title: Automatic Data Deletion:
deletion.desc: After 30 days, all conversation data is permanently deleted from our servers (GDPR compliance)

rights.title: Your GDPR Rights
rights.subtitle: Manage your data and privacy preferences

access.title: Right to Access
access.desc: Download a copy of all data we hold

help_new.title: Help & Support
help_new.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SafeMentor.

docs.title: Complete Documentation
docs.desc: Visit our help center for full guides and FAQs

surveillance.title: Why This Is Not a Surveillance Tool
surveillance.subtitle: Protecting child privacy while ensuring safety

notDo.title: What SafeMentor Does NOT Do:
items: No chat replay or message history viewing
No emotion scoring or behavioral surveillance
No tracking of child's location or device usage
No parent access to raw chat logs

does.title: What SafeMentor Does:
items: Provides AI companion for child to talk freely
Detects patterns that may indicate risk
Alerts parents only when serious concerns detected

whySafer.title: Why this is safer for kids:
whySafer.desc: Privacy protection encourages honest communication. Children need a confidential space to process emotions without fear of surveillance. This builds trust and enables earlier intervention when needed.

rawChat.title: Why Parents Don't See Raw Chats:
rawChat.desc: Protecting child dignity and developmental autonomy. Children need private space to develop identity and emotional regulation. Constant surveillance damages trust and healthy development.

insulation.title: How Insulation Works:
insulation.desc: Only serious concerns trigger alerts. This avoids "snitching dynamics" where children stop talking honestly. The AI distinguishes between normal struggles and genuine risk.

balance.title: Trust + Safety Balance:
balance.desc: SafeMentor is designed to support parent-child relationship, not replace it. Privacy-by-default maintains trust while safety alerts enable timely intervention.

step1.title: Child Talks to AI Companion
step1.desc: Private conversations in a safe space

step2.title: AI Analyzes Patterns
step2.desc: Looking for emotional trends and risk indicators

step3.title: Parents See Aggregated Data
step3.desc: General mood trends, no raw messages

info.title: Informational Signal
info.desc: General patterns detected. No immediate action needed. For your awareness only.

yellow.title: Yellow Flag
yellow.desc: Potential concern detected. Consider having a gentle check-in conversation with your child.

red.title: Red Flag
red.desc: Serious concern requiring immediate attention. Safety issue detected (self-harm, abuse, etc.)

positives.title: False Positives (Over-detection):
positives.desc: AI may flag innocent conversations as concerning. Example: "I want to die" in context of a video game. Always consider context and trust your judgment.

negatives.title: False Negatives (Under-detection):
negatives.desc: AI may miss subtle signs or coded language. This tool supports—but does not replace—your parental awareness and relationship with your child.

reminder.title: Critical Reminder:
reminder.desc: SafeMentor looks for patterns that may indicate risk. It cannot see everything and may miss or misinterpret signals. Your judgment and relationship with your child remain primary.

emergency.title: Emergency Resources
emergency.subtitle: If you have immediate safety concerns, contact professional help directly

overview_new.title: Overview
overview_new.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's your child safety summary.
overview_new.healthyPatterns: Your child's conversations show healthy patterns. Continue regular check-ins.

disclaimer.title: ⚠️ Important:
disclaimer.text: SafeMentor looks for patterns that may indicate risk. It cannot see everything and may miss or misinterpret signals. This tool supports—but does not replace—your relationship with your child.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection Active
privacy.desc: Only aggregated emotional trends are shown. Individual messages remain private to protect your child's confidential space. Safety alerts are shown separately if AI detects concerning patterns.

children_new.title: Children Data
children_new.subtitle: Manage your connected children and their safety preferences.
children_new.noChildren: No children listed yet. Click "Add Child" to begin.

notifications_new.title: Safety Notifications
notifications_new.subtitle: Monitor and respond to safety alerts for your children.
notifications_new.noActiveAlerts: No active alerts at this time

disclaimer.title: ⚠️ Important:
disclaimer.text: SafeMentor **is not** a human expert and **can make errors**. For help, **please always first contact a human expert**.

support.title: Need to Talk? Find Support Now
support.desc: If you have immediate safety concerns, there is professional help:

nextSteps.title: What to Do Next
nextSteps.desc: Immediate safety concerns should be addressed directly. Use our guide for conversation starters.

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this child? This action cannot be undone.

Hero.title: Supporting children with guidance, trust, and space to grow
Hero.subtitle: SafeMentor helps families nurture curiosity, build trust, and support healthy development — with technology that respects childhood.

Values.title: SafeMentor is not another screen-time product
Values.description: It is a thinking and mentoring companion designed to help children develop curiosity, responsibility, emotional strength, and real-world connection — with strong support for parents.
Values.emphasis: Children don't need more apps. They need guidance, trust, and space to grow.
Values.citation: SafeMentor is built on internationally recognized child-development principles from Gerald Hüther, Jesper Juul, Dan Siegel, and principle-based thinking. We do not shape children through control. We invite development through relationship.

card1.title: Curiosity over pressure
card1.desc: Encouraging wonder and exploration, not performance metrics

card2.title: Connection over control
card2.desc: Development through relationship, not forced behavior

card3.title: Trust over surveillance
card3.desc: Insight for parents without invading children's privacy

learning.title: Learning & Understanding
learning.description: SafeMentor supports children with understanding school topics, exploring ideas and interests, and working through problems step by step.

callout.title: Important:
callout.desc1: SafeMentor does not give instant answers for homework.
callout.desc2: Instead, it asks guiding questions, helps children think step by step, and encourages their own ideas.

learning.emphasis: Because learning should activate the brain, not replace it.

offline.title: Offline Life Comes First
offline.description: SafeMentor actively encourages offline activities, creativity in the real world, and time with friends, family, and nature.
offline.emphasis: The best moments don't happen on a screen.

emotional.title: Emotional Support — Without Replacing Humans
emotional.description: SafeMentor listens when children want to talk. It can help children name emotions, encourage reflection, and suggest healthy next steps.

callout.title: But it is not a therapist

emotional.final: When needed, SafeMentor gently encourages talking to parents, talking to trusted adults, and seeking real human support.

safety.title: Safety & Early Warning
safety.description: SafeMentor looks for patterns, not secrets.

detect.title: What We Detect
list: Serious red flags: self-harm, grooming, bullying, drugs, harm to others

protects.title: This Protects Trust
protects.desc: Between child and parent. Children need to know they can express themselves safely, while parents stay informed about their wellbeing.

Approach.title: Technology that knows when to step back
Approach.description: SafeMentor is designed to support children's natural curiosity and emotional growth — then gently guide them back to real-world experiences, conversations, and play.

bullet1.title: Encourages offline exploration
bullet1.desc: Suggests activities, conversations, and experiences that happen away from screens.

bullet2.title: Keeps parents informed
bullet2.desc: Clear, honest communication about what your child is learning and experiencing.

Families.title: Supporting Parents — Not Judging Them
Families.description: SafeMentor exists to support parents, not replace them.

receives.title: Parents receive:
list: Context for what signals mean — and what they don't
Suggestions for how to talk to their child
Encouragement to build trust and connection
receives.emphasis: We never shame parents. We help them grow together with their child.

trust.title: Built on Trust
list: Trust is more powerful than control
trust.final: SafeMentor is designed to disappear when it's no longer needed.
trust.emphasis: Because success means: A child who thinks, feels, connects — and lives fully offline.

Quote.text: "SafeMentor helped our family have conversations we didn't know how to start. It's not about the technology — it's about bringing us closer together."
Quote.author: Maria K.

CTA.title: Ready to learn how SafeMentor works?
CTA.subtitle: Discover a calmer, more thoughtful approach to technology for your family.
CTA.disclaimer: No commitment required. Just thoughtful information.

Footer.text: Technology that respects childhood. Built with care, guided by ethics, focused on what matters most.
Footer.bottom: Made with care for children and families.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

sidebar.title: Your Child’s Privacy & Safety
sidebar.description: SafeMentor is built on the principle of "Data Minimization." We only process what is strictly needed to keep your child safe.

riskSignals.label: Risk Signals:
riskSignals.value: Only keywords indicating bullying, anxiety, predation, or self-harm are flagged.

usageStats.label: App Usage Stats:
usageStats.value: Time spent and broad activity categories for wellbeing logs.

improve.title: Help improve SafeMentor
improve.description: Allow us to use 100% anonymized crash logs to fix bugs.

safeAnalysis.title: Allow anonymous safety analysis
safeAnalysis.description: Helps train our safety AI on new slang and threats.

footer.agreement: I understand how data is used & agree to Terms
